cab.content: f'From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department,loth August 1917.Foreign Secret. Your Army Department telegram 2-kk July. Aden. P 3158] Xew*arrangements take effect at once. Please instruct Resident accordingly. You may rest assured that His Majesty's Government do not contemplate departure from established lines of policy and will give careful consideration to Indian interests, importance of which they fully appreciate. Resident will report henceforth to High Commissioner, Cairo, but he should be instructed to keep Your Excellency's Government regularly informed on all matters affecting Indian interests.
